titleInfo.title: Festival of Story and Song at the Ensworth School (2011)

mods.abstract: Three color window card (purple and black on gray) announcing the Festival of Story and Song with Pat Flynn, Caryl Parker, Jimmy Hall, Janey Clewer, Bruce Gaitsch, Barry Scott, Todd Boswell, Joe Awad, Helen Hudson, Persephone Fentress, Calvin, Sara and Odessa Settles, Amy Grant and Vince Gill at Ensworth School on May 25.
